XIII.i.1.A.1.b
.
Who May Be Eligible for DEA
DEA may be awarded to a Veteran’s (or service member’s)
child
spouse, or
surviving spouse.
Reference
:  For more information on who is eligible for DEA, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 1.B.1.a
.
